Parameters: TextView: The TextView against which to invoke the method.
int: The resource identifier of the style to apply.
setTextAppearance(android.widget.TextVie.Description: Sets the text appearance from the specified style resource. Use a framework-defined TextAppearance style like @B_android#R#style#TextAppearance_Material_Body1_E@.

getMinLines(android.widget.TextView).Description: Returns the minimum number of lines displayed in the given TextView, or -1 if the minimum height was set in pixels instead.

Returns: an int corresponding to one of the auto-size types: @B_android#support#v4#widget#TextViewCompat#AUTO_SIZE_TEXT_TYPE_NONE_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#widget#TextViewCompat#AUTO_SIZE_TEXT_TYPE_UNIFORM_E@
getAutoSizeTextType(android.widget.TextV.Description: Returns the type of auto-size set for this widget.

getMaxLines(android.widget.TextView).Description: Returns the maximum number of lines displayed in the given TextView, or -1 if the maximum height was set in pixels instead.

Returns: the current auto-size maximum text size in pixels (the default is 112sp). Note that if auto-size has not been configured this function returns -1.
the current auto-size minimum text size in pixels (the default is 12sp). Note that if auto-size has not been configured this function returns -1.
